titles: The old apostolical way of preaching, or, Peters last legacy to  all his true successors in the ministry and faith of the Gospel being an awakening word from a dying-preacher to his dying-hearers in a sermon preached on the death of Mr. Edward West, late minister of the gospel in London / by Thomas Cole ...
author: Cole, Thomas, 1627?-1697.
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
